summary: This is an email from Daniel Besselsen, Assistant Vice President of Finance at Interlochen Center for the Arts, regarding a student's application documents (GX 742) for summer camp in 1998. He inquires if the recipient is also interested in the same student's 1997 summer camp application and 1999-2000 high school year application. The document is marked as subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Daniel Besselsen
persons.role: Assistant Vice President of Finance at Interlochen Center for the Arts
persons.context: He is the sender of the email, inquiring about the scope of document requests related to a student's applications.

events.title: Student's Summer Camp Application (1997)
events.description: Mentioned as a potential document of interest related to a student.

events.title: Student's Summer Camp Application (1998)
events.description: Referenced as document GX 742, which is the current subject of the email.

events.title: Student's High School Year Application (1999-2000)
events.description: Mentioned as another potential document of interest related to the same student.

keyFacts: The email discusses document requests related to a student's applications to Interlochen Center for the Arts.
Document GX 742 is identified as the student's summer camp application from 1998.
Daniel Besselsen inquires if additional applications from 1997 and 1999-2000 are also of interest.
The correspondence is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs.
The document appears to be part of a legal or investigative process, given the reference to exhibit numbers and a protective order.
